mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NUM, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, WRITE_DATE, HIT, NOTICE_FILE FROM NOTICE
SELECT ROWNUM, NOTICE_NUM, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, WRITE_DATE, HIT, NOTICE_FILE FROM NOTICE WHERE ROWNUM <= 3 ORDER BY NOTICE_NUM DESC
SELECT NOTICE_NUM, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, WRITE_DATE, HIT, NOTICE_FILE FROM NOTICE WHERE #{searchKind} LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NOTICE_NUM, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, WRITE_DATE, NOTICE_FILE) VALUES(NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, SYSDATE, #{notice_file})
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, WRITE_DATE = SYSDATE, NOTICE_FILE = #{notice_file} WHERE NOTICE_NUM = #{notice_num}
UPDATE NOTICE SET Hit = Hit+1 WHERE NOTICE_NUM = #{notice_num}
